title: Cherry Creek Mall in your back yard!
posting_body: ['Live among the clouds in one of Metropolis updated homes.', 'Metropolis high-rise towers above its surroundings at thirteen floors!', 'With a completely unobstructed view of downtown Denver and the Front Range, sunsets over the mountains will be a daily treat.', 'To top it off, they feature stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors and a shared workout space.', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', '<URL> Community Amenities Non-Smoking Community • 24/7 Emergency Maintenance •', 'Pet Friendly • Additional Storage Facility • Card Operated Laundry • Completely Remodeled •', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi • Controlled Access • Controlled Access Parking Garage • Fitness Center • On-Site Maintenance • Submit Work Requests Online •', 'Recycling On Site • Online Payments Available • Branch Home Office Furniture Discount • FORTE Fitness Discount •', 'Smoke-Free Community •', 'Move', 'In Guarantee Apartment Amenities Air Conditioner • Closet Organizers • Designer Cabinetry • Designer Lighting • Dishwasher • FSC-Certified Wood Flooring •', 'Microwave', '•', 'Refrigerator', '•', 'Silestone Countertops • Slate Floor Tiles • Stainless Steel Appliances Mon-Fri: 10AM-6PM Saturday: 10AM-5PM']
